mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_BOARD(WRITE_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, IMGNAME, ID) VALUES(REVIEW_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgName}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW_BOARD ORDER BY WRITE_NO DESC) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{s} AND #{e}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW_BOARD ORDER BY VIEWS DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_BOARD SET VIEWS=VIEWS+1 WHERE WRITE_NO=#{writeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_RE(RE_NICK, RE_COMENT, WRITE_GROUP, RE_ID) VALUES(#{reNick}, #{reComent}, #{writeGroup}, #{reId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW_RE WHERE WRITE_GROUP = #{writeNo} ORDER BY RE_DATE DESC
SELECT LIKES FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE WRITE_NO=#{writeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE NICKNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{s} AND #{e}
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW_BOARD WHERE NICKNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{s} AND #{e}
